description:
**Fix Overview**:

The recent issue affecting Outlook has been resolved as confirmed by Microsoft. To ensure your Outlook functions optimally in the future, it is advisable to check for any updates regularly and verify that you are utilizing the latest version available.

1. Open Outlook.
2. Navigate to **File** > **Office Account**.
3. Select **Update Options** > **Update Now** to install any pending updates.

**Details**:
- Keeping Outlook updated ensures that you benefit from the latest bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Regularly check for any known issues related to updates on the Microsoft support page to stay informed. (LLM Synthesized)
